00003 /**
00004  * use other models inside models just like inside controllers. for use in standalone
00005  * classes (like rpc-handlers)

00014 
00015 /**
00016  * use other models inside models just like inside controllers
00017  * @package kata_model
00018  */
00019 class ModelLoader {
00020 
00021     public $uses = array();
00022 
00023     public function __get($name) {
00024         if (!is_array($this->uses)) {
00025             throw new InvalidArgumentException('uses needs to be an array');
00026         }
00027         if (!in_array($name, $this->uses)) {
00028             throw new InvalidArgumentException("Model $name is not in uses class of this model");
00029         }
00030 
00031         $mdl = getModel($name);
00032         $this->$name = $mdl;
00033         return $mdl;
00034     }
00035 
00036 }
